name: Zinc
headline: The secret backbone of e-commerce.
description:
Our team has built listing creation, inventory management, repricing, and fulfillment software currently used by tens of thousands of the top Amazon and eBay sellers. We power the entire product catalog for dozens of US and international e-commerce sites. Our founders and lead engineers hail from MIT and have worked at top-tier Silicon Valley companies including Palantir, Stripe, Dropbox, Nest, and Optimizely.

Thousands of small business owners around the world make a living using Zinc's software. As the backbone of these online stores, Zinc's software powers hundreds of millions of dollars in annual sales. We offer an unconventional work environment focused on results, not hours. Zinc is backed by Y Combinator and some of the best angel investors in Silicon Valley, but we are also profitable and independent.

![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/675c974a904e4003a0599adf/1735899201759-7LM09AC1BAV94XXCARH6/unsplash-image-vaYxtGpgzfU.jpg)
## **Retail API for AI agents.**
Power your agents with high-quality retail data and ordering automation. Let us handle the complexity—so you can scale faster.
[ Get API key ](http://zinc.com/</pricing>)
[ Documentation ](http://zinc.com/<https:/docs.zincapi.com/#introduction>)
### Power your AI with**seamless retail integrations**
**Simple** – Create advanced retail automation with single API calls
**Flexible** – Ordering and data from major retailers
**Powerful** – Real-time, complete, and high-quality price and catalog data
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/675c974a904e4003a0599adf/1737156070414-5TXBAEHDM48TDB0WUQ9T/unsplash-image-MSN8TFhJ0is.jpg)
### Try the **Zinc API** demo
We built an open-source chatbot powered by the **Zinc API** to show what it can do. Try out some of our sample prompts or submit your own queries. Go through a product purchasing workflow and see how our API generates requests and processes responses.
[ Try now ](http://zinc.com/<https:/whai.zinc.com/>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/675c974a904e4003a0599adf/1735896039865-EP98PQFKSC76H4L24Y98/unsplash-image-VBLHICVh-lI.jpg)
### Why AI companies choose **Zinc**
  * Reduce complexity 
Lower operational costs and order _without_ the need to manage retailer accounts via our Zinc Managed Accounts ([**_ZMA_**](http://zinc.com/<https:/zincapi.com/index.html#features>)) service[.](http://zinc.com/<https:/zincapi.com/index.html#features>)
  * Instantly scale 
Enable high-volume ordering while avoiding delays associated with ordering limits, account closures, restrictive funding options, and more with [**_ZMA_**](http://zinc.com/<https:/zincapi.com/index.html#features>).
  * Customizable 
With [_ZincWorks_ we can a](http://zinc.com/<https:/zincapi.com/zinc-works.html>)dapt and develop for your exact use case – whether creating new retailer integrations or adding specific API features.
  * Trustworthy 
Zinc has been the leading retail API provider for over 10 years by creating reliable and secure connections your team can build around.


[ Contact us ](http://zinc.com/</contact>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/675c974a904e4003a0599adf/af09627e-790d-4b2b-a045-b169be0e8a8f/unsplash-image-2xEQDxB0ss4.jpg)
## **Explore our docs**
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/675c974a904e4003a0599adf/ea3e091a-954c-4b77-88a2-eb40d81aaa76/group.png)
**End-to-end fulfillment**
Full-service ordering includes retail checkout [**with a single API call**](http://zinc.com/<https:/docs.zincapi.com/#orders>), tracking, and return automations directly from your application.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/675c974a904e4003a0599adf/8f2a2933-5913-4903-b5a0-b24761dd9d60/loupe.png)
**Data accuracy**
Always fetch live and complete data including [**search, product details, and prices.**](http://zinc.com/<https:/docs.zincapi.com/#realtime-product-data>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/675c974a904e4003a0599adf/b272d71a-4377-4536-a3bd-2ccfc456f0a5/automation.png)
**Developer-friendly**
Integrate quickly with simple RESTful API calls, robust docs, and ready-to-use code snippets.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/675c974a904e4003a0599adf/969d6a04-f234-4ff6-82a5-15e8b0054966/performance.png)
**Scalable for AI**
Our API includes [**endpoints specifically tailored for use with LLM tool calling.**](http://zinc.com/<https:/docs.zincapi.com/#ai-routes>)
[ Documentation ](http://zinc.com/<https:/docs.zincapi.com/#introduction>)
## **Get started**
Ready to integrate with retail markets and automate orders in your AI application? Reach out to start a free trial or request a demo!
[ Docs ](http://zinc.com/<https:/docs.zincapi.com/#introduction>)
[ Pricing ](http://zinc.com/</pricing>)
[ Contact ](http://zinc.com/</contact>)

generated_description:
Zinc is carving out its niche as "the secret backbone of e-commerce." Founded in 2014 and part of Y Combinator's W14 batch, this San Francisco-based company develops powerful software for listing creation, inventory management, repricing, and fulfillment. Their innovative tools are crucial for tens of thousands of Amazon and eBay sellers, driving hundreds of millions in annual sales. Their journey is backed by a team with impressive credentials, including alumni from MIT and major players like Palantir, Stripe, and Dropbox.

At its core, Zinc provides APIs that simplify retail operations for AI companies. By offering seamless integrations, high-quality data, and automation, they empower users to scale their businesses effortlessly. They cater to thousands of small business owners globally, creating an environment where results trump hours logged. With only ten employees, Zinc maintains a lean yet effective team, committed to innovation and profitability without sacrificing independence.

Their product offerings are robust, including full-service ordering, real-time data accuracy, and developer-friendly APIs. Touted for reducing complexity and ensuring reliability, Zinc invites businesses to explore its solutions through demos and documentation.

If you’re in the e-commerce space, Zinc might just be the partner you need to level up your operations. Check them out at [zinc.com](http://zinc.com) and see how they can power your online success!
